vulnerabilities.title: Deserialization of Untrusted Data in bson
vulnerabilities.description: All versions of bson before 1.1.4 are vulnerable to Deserialization of Untrusted Data. The package will ignore an unknown value for an object's _bsontype, leading to cases where an object is serialized as a document rather than the intended BSON type.

vulnerabilities.title: Deserialization of Untrusted Data in bson
vulnerabilities.description: Incorrect parsing of certain JSON input may result in js-bson not correctly serializing BSON. This may cause unexpected application behaviour including data disclosure.
